and.name: jOrganizer
and.description: JOrganizer app organizes your daily needs!

and.name: Calendar
and.description: Basic feature of the jOrganizer. Consists of typical calendar functions like visualisation of date and time.

and.name: Meetings
and.description: Enables the function to enter meetings or appointments for a specifical date and time. Consists of a meeting title, date, time, place and a remark.

or.name: Print
or.description: Print function. For example, could the user print the current view (or a specifical section) as a PDF or HTML document.

or.name: I/O
or.description: Basic I/O operations for import from and export to different calendar formats.

or.name: Share
or.description: Share function (like modern "share buttons") with a possibility for several protocols. The basic protocol to share would be via email.

or.name: Chat
or.description: Chat function with a possibility for several protocols.

and.name: Notes
and.description: Function for quick notes (like one note)

feature.name: History
feature.description: History function for storing more than one note.
